transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha ji sir.
Customer: Ji ji sir good morning kaise hain aap sab theek thak?
Executive: Badhiya ji badhiya.
Customer: Main ye keh raha hun aap jyada kar jo na to main jyada se jyada ek din mein unko check kar sakta hun.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Ji uske baad sir hum keh rahe hain ki aap ab aapko wo wali baat hai ki dusre ki thali aise hi lagti hai main keh raha hun aapke paas sabse jyada aa raha hai main itne leader wale ke paas bhi nahi aa raha hai sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo wo wali baat nahi hai sir kehne ka matlab main to main itne jo hota hun dusre pe main kabhi bhi ladkane rakhta hun main kya hai malik pe bharosa rakhta hun.
Customer: Nahi nahi bilkul sir bilkul.
Executive: Jitna aapne nasib mein likha hua hai na to wo to milega hi milega ye kya hai aap mehnat karte rahenge to ek din manzil pe zarur pahuchenge.
Customer: Nahi nahi sahi baat hai sir aap dusre bache ko kya kehne ka matlab mera ye hai sir ki dekhiye sir koi cheez hai na pair ko agar juta khane lag jaye na to pair kaat ke alag nahi kiya ja sakta wo juta hi alag karna padta hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir.
Customer: Sare to baat hai wo wali baat hai to kehne ka matlab koi business mein nuksan chal raha hai na to us nuksan ki bharpai business se hi hogi ab apan isko aur lamba leke chalenge to aur jyada nuksan hoga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Jahir si baat hai abhi main chalo suppose karta hun ke maine 4 lakh ka business nikal liya ek saal mein to ek saal mein mera to pura khota ho gayi nahi na.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Kam se kam 15-20 lakh ka business aaye jab jaake koi main dekhu ki yaar wapis invest karenge to wapis hoga.
Executive: Wo hai.
Executive: Aap baat to apni jagah bilkul sahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Par hum jis aaj ki date mein jis market mein baithe hain na sir aaj ki date mein to aap to chalo is wale setup ke sath mein baitha hun main keh raha hun ki mere paas abhi ek cement plant lagate hain jinka 4-4, 5-5 crore rupaye ka ek ek product hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai aaj ki date mein unke liye aap man liye koi cement planter lagane wale market mein kitne player honge sir kam hi honge na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kyunki unko pure saal mein 10 ya 12 hi lead generate hoti hai pure saal mein ek mahine mein do mahine mein ek koi lead generate hogi.
Customer: Baat bhi sahi hai.
Executive: Aaj ki date mein market mein itna jabardast competition hai.
Customer: Unka karodon ka investment hai sir wo agar 2% bhi kamaye na to bhi bahut hai 1% bhi kamaye na to main kehta hun bahut sara aata hai.
Executive: Wo hai.
Executive: Sir unka unka ek bhi plant ek baar bhi agar koi supplies mil gaya unko 500 truck ki bol diya to unka to waise hi ho gaya.
Customer: Sir main to wahi to keh raha hun to aapka bhi to aise hi hai sir aapka kaun se kam hai aap ye mujhe batao sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi abhi abhi jo lead on peak nahi mil rahi hai na abhi jo abhi wo lead nahi mil rahi hai na sir milti to main aapko ye batao main chup karta mere ko to business chahiye maine paisa kyun invest kiya ye bataiye aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir ab main bhi wo cheez humein bhi samajh mein aa gayi hai.
Customer: Kehne ka matlab mera to wahi cheez hai ke dekhiye sir koi bhi cheez ho agar nuksan dene wali cheez hai to main to kehta hun mera ek niyam hai main marble ka kaam karta hun aur bacchon ko bhi maine bol rakha hai jis cheez mein ghata hai na usko jaldi bech do.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kyunki usme wo rokega na to aur jyada badh ke ghata aayega.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Wo hai abhi mere do teen patthar jaise correct utar gaye the.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To ab usko to maine ko pata hai 3 lakh ka patthar laya hai to ab iske 2 lakh hone hi hone hain.
Customer: Ab main usko jyada rokunga to mere ko pata hai 1.5 lakh hi aayenge.
Executive: Sahi hai.
Customer: To main wahi hai ke isko nuksan ho raha hai to usko hatao phir uska paisa apan dusri jagah invest karenge wo nikal ke dusra soda layenge to waha se kama lenge apan.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo cheeze hai sir dekhiye sir main bhi ek general knowledge rakhta hun kyunki mere ko bhi 25 se 30 saal ho gaye market mein.
Executive: Sir main tabhi to keh raha hun ki wo jo paise ki knowledge hai na wo aapke jabardast hai sir main uske liye appreciate karta hun aapko.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Main to wo planning sahi hai sir achhi baat hai sir but wahi hai ki aisa nahi hai ki dekhiye business ka ek usool hai sir ki wo kehte hain ki bhai shop khuli hui hai to customer aayega aayega sir.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: To yaha pe bhi wahi cheez hai ki bhai.
Customer: Main to shop band thodi karta hun sir main to shop ye hai ki apan mall mein nahi leke footpath pe aa rahe hain bas jyada se jyada hai to apne footing pe hi na.
Executive: Wo hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi bilkul sir bilkul correct wo wali baat hai.
Executive: Ji ab ab isme kya karana chah rahe ho abhi aap do do category chal rahi hai ek to marble temple ki chal rahi hai ek marble carving ki chal rahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji chal rahi hai.
Executive: To aap isse hai na marble jaali pe kar dijiye marble carving wali ko marble carving wali ko marble jaali chah rahe hain abhi aap.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Ji ji theek hai marble jaali ka main ek baar dekh leta hun ek minute sir.
Executive: Marble jaali hai marble.
Executive: Marble jaali mein jo total lead approved ho rahi hai sir 12 mahine mein 259 269 hai 269 hai theek hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Aur marble carving mein jo hai 188 hai to theek hai koi dikkat nahi marble jaali mein main kar deta hun sir isko.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Marble carving wali ko marble jaali mein kar raha hun sir theek hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji theek hai.
Customer: Ji sir ab aap dhyan rakhna hai aur dekho sab nasibon ki baatein hai apne nasib mein sahi hai to kahin nahi jayegi.
Customer: Ab maine kya hai main ye search kiya tha ki chalo koi nahi apan invest bada karte hain to kya pata apan ko bada mil jaye.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo wali baat hai.
Executive: Sir main trust se hi nikal raha tha.
Customer: Trust se bhi milega sir bilkul milega aisa nahi hai ki nahi milega.
Executive: Nahi sir maine trust se bhi jaise teen char kaam kiye itna to maine usse hi nikal liya tha.
Customer: Wo hai aap mera review wagera dekha hoga.
Executive: Sir wo to maine sare us din aapne video wagera bheje sari cheeze maine dekhi hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To main to khud hi us cheez ke liye appreciate karta hun ki bhai aapka kaam jo hai bahut sahi tarike se aap kaam kar rahe hain market mein ek achhi image bana ke sir.
Customer: Wo to offline hi hai mera wo hai na offline hi hai abhi bhi mera ek kaam chal raha hai Punjab ka phagwara offline mein kam se kam maine to wo kaam kar diya 80 se 90 lakh rupaye ka.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Badhiya hai sir.
Customer: Wo wali baat hai ye nahi hai ke kaam nahi kar rahe main to ek portal ye thi bacchon ko naya sikhana chahta hun ki bhai kaam kaise karte hain kya hota hai kya nahi hota hai wo hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sahi baat hai sir bilkul.
Customer: Ji ji sahi hai ye bhi sahi hai.
Customer: Dekhiye sir koi pata nahi insan ka kab kya hota hai wo hai karodon ki company zero pe bhi aa jati hai kai baar.
Executive: Nahi nahi sahi baat hai sir dekho main keh raha hun sir jo insan mehnat karna jaanta hai na usko kabhi bhi darne ki zarurat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji wo wali baat hai.
Executive: Jo log mehnat nahi karte na unko darne ki zarurat hai kyunki unke liye ye hai ki bhai aaj nahi to ho sakta hai ki bhai upar wala aaj dekh raha hai usse upar wale ka sahi hath hai aapke upar ki bhai chalo theek hai aap bina mehnat kare aapke paas aa raha hai par koi na koi to ek aisa din aayega na ki bhai jaha pe wo cheeze us direction mein nahi rahegi.
Customer: Kaam kyunki wo karodon ka kaam ho gaya uske baad mein kya karenge.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Uske baad mein to kaam chahiye na apan ko ye hai ki wo kaam uske piche rahenge lifetime.
Executive: Hmm sahi baat hai sir.
Executive: Wo wali baat hai.
Executive: Maine kar diya hai kar diya hai sir maine change maine aapko whatsapp bhi bhej diya hai uska theek hai change karke bhej dijiye baki isko complete karke main close kar deta hun uske feedback ko aap okay kar dena abhi aapne negative feedback de diya tha usko.
Executive: Theek hai ji ji baki se touch mein rahega sir theek theek hai thank you thank you so much thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads.

- Wants to switch from marble carving to jaali.



Resolution:

- Executive changed the category to marble jaali.

- Executive sent the update on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide positive feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category change, marble jaali
